modeHelp: Server = Built-in MQTT broker (original). Client = Connect to external MQTT broker (e.g. Mosquitto).
bindAddressHelp: IP address the MQTT broker listens on (0.0.0.0 = all interfaces)
serverUserHelp: Username for MQTT authentication (empty = no authentication)
brokerHostHelp: IP address or hostname of the external MQTT broker (e.g. 192.168.1.100 or mosquitto.local)
brokerUserHelp: Username for the external MQTT broker (empty = no authentication)
clientIdHelp: Unique client ID for broker connection (default: iobroker_sonoff_<instance>)
topicPrefixHelp: Optional prefix prepended to Tasmota topics (e.g. 'home/floor1' if Tasmota topics are 'home/floor1/tele/...'). Leave empty for standard Tasmota topics.
topicStructureHelp: Standard: tele/<device>/STATE (Tasmota default: %prefix%/%topic%/). Device-first: <device>/tele/STATE (Tasmota FullTopic: %topic%/%prefix%/ or tasmota/%topic%/%prefix%/).
rejectUnauthorizedHelp: When enabled, self-signed certificates will be rejected. Disable for self-signed certificates.
caCertPathHelp: Path to the broker's CA certificate (optional, e.g. /etc/ssl/certs/ca.pem)
clientCertPathHelp: Path to client certificate for mutual TLS authentication (optional)
clientKeyPathHelp: Path to client private key for mutual TLS authentication (optional)
cleanSessionHelp: When enabled, all previous subscriptions are cleared on connect (recommended)
clientTimeoutHelp: After this time (seconds) without a message, the device is marked offline (0 = disabled)
objTreeHelp: Create nested JSON data as folder structure in object tree (instead of flat dot notation)
